short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VideoPro is a Chrome extension for screen recording with microphone support, saving files in high-quality MKV format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with VideoPro! Record your screen with crystal-clear audio from your microphone and save your creations in the high-quality MKV format. Perfect for tutorials, presentations, or capturing important moments on your screen. Simple, reliable, and built to deliver seamless recording right from your browser.
